name: Honda City
about: The City excels in space and comfort, is reasonably feature-packed, and gets ADAS too. Itâ€™s also impressive for its reliability, powerful 1.5-litre petrol engine's refinement, and is known for the six-speed manual's performance and CVT's convenience.

name: Wagon R
about: The Wagon R is a versatile hatchback, offering ample space and smart storage options thanks to its tall design. With a comfortable ride, decent features, and a fuel-efficient engine with both petrol and CNG power it's ideal for easy city commuting.

name: Defender
about: The Land Rover Defender offers three- and five-door options with four petrol and one diesel engine options. Its rugged build quality and off-road capability combine with excellent ride quality and on-road comfort.

name: Mahindra BE 6
about: The Mahindra BE 6 is the brand's first born-electric vehicle, built on an advanced INGLO platform designed for EVs. It offers a futuristic coupe-style SUV stance and a choice between 59kWh and 79kWh battery packs,
